entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is introduced as someone who comes flying into the hall looking terrified.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as someone who asks Dudley what happened and what's the matter.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is introduced as someone who is staring terrified towards the fire.

entities.name: vernon
entities.description: Vernon is introduced as someone who is also staring at the fire with Aunt Petunia.

entities.name: fireplace
entities.description: The fireplace is described as having a fake coal fire plugged in front of it.

relationships.description: Harry asks Dudley what happened and what's the matter.
Aunt Petunia and Vernon share a terrified expression towards the fire.
Harry observes the loud hangings and scrapings coming from behind the fireplace.
Aunt Petunia also observes the loud hangings and scrapings coming from behind the fireplace.
